posts.postText: Anyone know why theres no one in flood now?
Flood died and went to heaven
I dont know where you have been, ever since it got downgraded to 10 slots, flood has died.

>> I dont know where you have been, ever since it got downgraded to 10 slots, flood has died. 
It died before that, that's why it got downgraded.

>> Ben":2tqwm8qq]>> I dont know where you have been, ever since it got downgraded to 10 slots, flood has died. 
It died before that, that's why it got downgraded. 
It was more inactive than it previously was, yes. But that was because of all the admin's lack of attention and all the new props/weapons that didnt work or just arent good.

The weapons werent new, but some of them were stupid and didnt work.
that  sucks dont you have to pay to run a server? cause a dead server is  a waste of money

>> that  sucks dont you have to pay to run a server? cause a dead server is  a waste of money 

Please don't bump dead threads. ^_^
